entry.title: Game: Mario Kart 8 (WiiU, 2014) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Mario Kart 8 (WiiU, 2014) (2)20141222
We played this for a long time and my daughter got really into it
too. I find Mario Kart to be really boring and annoying. I don't
like how you can't get good power-ups when you are in the lead. I
also think that it's not very good for kids because you can fall
off the course so much and it's so easy to get totally turned
around.

Total time: 2:03
  • Video Games
  • Mario Kart 8
  • WiiU
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Brick Mansions, starring Paul Walker (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Brick Mansions, starring Paul Walker (2014)20141222
I wasn't too impressed by this movie. The action was very cool, but
the plot and acting was pretty bad, particularly the "feel good"
moments at the end and the shameless cat-fight.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, starring Megan Fox (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, starring Megan Fox (2014)20141221
This was an awesome movie. I liked how funny and immature the
Turtles were. I liked how important April's character was to the
show. The jokes were very clever. Shredder and Splinter were both
awesome. I hope Sacks becomes like Krang.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Neighbors, starring Seth Rogen (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Neighbors, starring Seth Rogen (2014)20141216
Zac Effron looks so amazing in this movie. It's a pretty dumb movie
though. The awkward sex between the parents and their constant
cussing doesn't really do it for me. I feel like it's particularly
bad that the frat is constantly doing drugs rather than just
drinking, which doesn't seem as destructive to me.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (5)
entry.content:
Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (5)20141215
I played for about twenty minutes and did a few levels of Super
Mario Brothers. It was rad. I like how they break up the game into
teachable moments.

Total time: 5:01
  • Video Games
  • NES Remix
  • WiiU
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (26)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (26)20141213
We played for about an hour and beat the last two levels. The very
last level was very easy and not even that cool with the following
of the shell. The second-to-last level was really tough though.

Overall, I feel like this game was easier and less-fun than the
one on the Wii. I don't dislike it, but I can see it wasn't as
good. I don't intend to do the "challenges". We also didn't catch
Nabbit in every world and didn't want to spend time waiting for
him to appear, so we don't have the last save file star.

Total time: 29:22
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers U
  • WiiU
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: Super Mario 3D World (WiiU, 2013)
entry.content:
Game: Super Mario 3D World (WiiU, 2013)20141213
We played this for just the first level, which we played twice to
get everything. (The third star was harder to find.) So far, I
love it. The music is great and my wife loves being
Peach. (Although I would've liked to be her too because her jump
is so OP.)

Total time: 0:17
  • Video Games
  • Super Mario 3D World
  • WiiU
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: 22 Jump Street, starring Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: 22 Jump Street, starring Channing Tatum and Jonah Hill (2014)20141211
This movie was hilarious and made me laugh out loud so many
times. I love all the subtle in-jokes and the way they made fun of
the concept of the movie. The ending sequence was priceless too.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Book: The Hound of the Baskervilles, by Arthur Conan Doyle (1901)
entry.content:
Book: The Hound of the Baskervilles, by Arthur Conan Doyle (1901)20141211
I finished this after reading it for a week or so. It was very fun,
but also a bit strange that Holmes wasn't in it very much. I
thought the way the murdering worked was very clever.
  • Books
  • 1901

entry.title: Movie: Guardians of the Galaxy, starring Chris Pratt (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Guardians of the Galaxy, starring Chris Pratt (2014)20141210
This was a really fun movie. I had never heard of these characters,
but I always enjoy the "space world" side of the Marvel
universe. The dialogue was great and the fondness that Star-Lord
had for Earth was adorable. It was awesome that Laika was in the
archive.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (4)
entry.content:
Game: NES Remix (WiiU, 2013) (4)20141207
I played this for about three hours. I completed a lot of levels,
although didn't do any remix levels. My main thought after playing
so many levels is to reflect on how terribly controlling a lot of
these early games are. They are just such frustrating garbage
compared to even games like SMB1. Wow. Ice Climbers was
particularly bad.

--

I played a second session for about thirty minutes. I mostly
played Clu Clu Land, which is really bizarre. It controls okay,
but it is a very non-intuitive game. It's very unique though.

Total time: 4:42
  • Video Games
  • NES Remix
  • WiiU
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (23)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (23)20141206
We played for about three and a half hours. We beat the game and
played the first two Super Star Road levels. The final level
wasn't as cool as the final level of the last game, but it was
really fun. The Star Road levels are very hard. The second one
took us an incredibly long time to master and complete.

Total time: 25:52

  • New Super Mario Brothers U
  • WiiU
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (22)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (22)20141205
We played for about two hours and finished Meringue Clouds, plus
did a level of Peach's Castle and found a place to do some Turtle
Tipping to get 99 lives. It was very fun.

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 42 - Episode Eight
entry.content:
Downton Abbey - Season 5 - Episode 42 - Episode Eight20141202
This was a nice conclusion to a lot of the plot lines, although
in retrospect, I feel like this was a very weak season without a
lot of spectacles. I like the Rose is married, although I wonder
if that means she's off the show because she won't live with
them. Similarly, Tom is leaving. I'm very surprised that Anna was
arrested; hopefully it won't be drawn out because otherwise it's
the same plot as what happened to Bates.
  • TV Shows
  • Downton Abbey
